description: T(2n,n), array T given by A047000.
comments: Also: number of nonseparable planar rooted maps with n edges. - R. J. Mathar, Aug 18 2006
references: T. R. S. Walsh et al., Counting rooted maps by genus. III: Nonseparable maps. J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. B 18 (1975), 222-259.
